name: GREAT PLAINS INSTITUTE - INDUSTRIAL INNOVATION INITIATIVE (I3)
description: Coalition committed to advancing solutions key to decarbonizing the industrial sector
sampleDescriptions: Policies incentivizing industrial decarbonization, including but not limited to steel, iron, cement, asphalt, concrete, aluminum, and food & beverage. PROVE IT Act. IRA implementation.
